citations.narrative:
At the time of the inspection, the contingency plan could not be located to be reviewed. The contingency plan must be
maintained and made available for APHIS inspectors to assure compliance with specific regulations.
Correct by: Mar 21, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
